summary.Title: Exciting Job Opportunity at Salling Group Warehouse in Vejle (Cold storage facility)
summary.JobHeadline: Exciting Job Opportunity at Salling Group Warehouse in Vejle (Cold storage facility)
summary.Presentation: Are you looking for a job with great benefits in a dynamic and supportive work environment? Salling Group in Vejle is looking for hardworking and responsible individuals to join our team at the war

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Exciting Job Opportunity at Salling Group Warehouse in Vejle (Cold storage facility)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you looking for a job with great benefits in a dynamic and supportive work environment? Salling Group in Vejle is looking for hardworking and responsible individuals to join our team at the warehouse. If you're ready for a physically demanding role and enjoy working independently, this could be the perfect opportunity for you!

Flair is continuously seeking temporary staff for the warehouse in Vejle

Job Description:

As part of our warehouse team, you will be responsible for sorting pallets and preparing them for delivery in a cold storage environment, where temperatures range between 2-4°C. The role involves physically demanding tasks, including heavy lifting and routine sorting work.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Sorting and organizing pallets for delivery
  • Lifting and handling heavy items
  • Ensuring tasks are completed efficiently and on time
  • Working in a cold storage warehouse (2-4°C)

About You

We’re looking for someone who thrives in a routine-based, physical job and can work independently.

Ideal Candidate:

  • Thrives in a structured, routine-driven work environment
  • Ready for physical and demanding tasks
  • Able to communicate fluently in English
  • Has a positive attitude and enjoys being part of a team

Salary & Benefits

  • Hourly rate: 134.92 DKK/hour (excludes surcharges) + 9% 'fritvalgskonto" (flexible spending account)
  • Additional Benefits: Pension, holiday pay, and sick leave provided through Flair.
  • Shift Options: Day, evening, and night shifts available.

How to Apply

Interested? Don’t wait – apply today! Please include your preferred shifts in your application.

Note: Interviews and information sessions will take place on an ongoing basis, depending on demand. We are continuously seeking qualified candidates to join our team.
